type.name: org.gradle.api.Transformer
type.description:
A Transformer transforms objects of type.

Implementations are free to return new objects or mutate the incoming value.


param: The type the value is transformed to.
param: The type of the value to be transformed.

method.name: transform
method.description:
Transforms the given object, and returns the transformed value.
param:in The object to transform.

returns:The transformed object.
